review_text: I purchased this in advance for what I knew was going to be a lot of food prep Labor Day Weekend.I was so certain of the Cuisinart brand name that I threw out the boxes and other packaging and the damned thing didn't work.  Well, it worked for 10 seconds and then died.  It was probably the single biggest waste of $30 I have ever made and the entire thing ended up in the trash and I spent 4 hours chopping vegetables by hand.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
